trans-unit.source: Represents a claims-based identity.
trans-unit.target: 表示基于声明的标识。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity> class is a concrete implementation of a claims-based identity; that is, an identity described by a collection of claims.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity>类是基于声明的标识的具体实现; 一个标识，即描述的声明的集合。

trans-unit.source: A claim is a statement about an entity made by an issuer that describes a property, right, or some other quality of that entity.
trans-unit.target: 声明是有关实体所做的描述的属性，向右、 颁发者或某些其他质量的该实体的声明。

trans-unit.source: Such an entity is said to be the subject of the claim.
trans-unit.target: 这样的实体称为使用者的声明。

trans-unit.source: A claim is represented by the <xref:System.Security.Claims.Claim> class.
trans-unit.target: 声明由<xref:System.Security.Claims.Claim>类。

trans-unit.source: The claims contained in a <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity> describe the entity that the corresponding identity represents, and can be used to make authorization and authentication decisions.
trans-unit.target: 中包含的声明<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity>描述实体表示相应的标识，并且可以用于授权和身份验证决定。

trans-unit.source: A claims-based access model has many advantages over more traditional access models that rely exclusively on roles.
trans-unit.target: 基于声明的访问模型相比，具有许多优点更传统以独占方式依赖于角色的访问模型。

trans-unit.source: For example, claims can provide much richer information about the identity they represent and can be evaluated for authorization or authentication in a far more specific manner.
trans-unit.target: 例如，声明可以提供有关它们表示，以更特定的方式可以评估的授权或身份验证的标识多更丰富的信息。

trans-unit.source: Beginning with .NET Framework 4.5, Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) and claims-based identity have been fully integrated into the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 从.NET Framework 4.5 开始，Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) 和基于声明的标识已完全集成到.NET Framework。

trans-unit.source: This means that many classes that represent an identity in the .NET Framework now derive from <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity> and describe their properties through a collection of claims.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着现在表示.NET Framework 中的标识的许多类派生自<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity>并描述其属性访问集合的声明。

trans-unit.source: This is different from previous versions of the .NET Framework, in which, these classes implemented the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity> interface directly.
trans-unit.target: 这是不同于以前版本的.NET Framework 中，在其中，实现这些类<xref:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity>直接接口。

trans-unit.source: The collection of claims that describe the identity can be accessed through the <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.Claims%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过访问的描述标识的声明集合<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.Claims%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity> class provides several methods for finding and modifying claims and fully supports language integrated queries (LINQ).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity>类提供了几种方法可查找和修改声明和完全支持语言集成查询 (LINQ)。

trans-unit.source: In application code, <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity> objects are typically accessed through <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal> objects; for example, the principal returned by <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 在应用程序代码中，<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity>对象通常通过访问<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal>对象; 例如，返回的主体<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal> class has a <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal.Claims%2A> property as well.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal>类具有<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal.Claims%2A>以及属性。

trans-unit.source: In the majority of cases you should access the user’s claims through the <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal.Claims%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> collection rather than through the <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.Claims%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下，你应访问通过用户的声明<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal.Claims%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>集合而不是通过<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.Claims%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: You will need to access the claims of an individual <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity> only in the cases where the principal contains more than one <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity> and you need to evaluate or modify a specific identity.
trans-unit.target: 你将需要访问个人的声明<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity>仅在其中主体包含多个情况下<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity>并且需要进行评估或修改特定标识。

trans-unit.source: To add or remove claims from the <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.Claims%2A> collection, a caller must have full trust.
trans-unit.target: 若要添加或删除从声明<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.Claims%2A>集合，调用方必须具有完全信任。

trans-unit.source: In the claims-based model, the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property and the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method are implemented by evaluating the claims contained by an identity.
trans-unit.target: 在基于声明的模型中，<xref:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性和<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法实现通过计算包含由标识的声明。

trans-unit.source: The base implementations in the claims-based model are provided by the <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property and the <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal.IsInRole%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 基于声明的模型中的基实现提供的<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性和<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal.IsInRole%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.NameClaimType%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.RoleClaimType%2A> properties enable you to specify a claim type that should be used to evaluate the claims contained by the identity when performing these operations.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.NameClaimType%2A>和<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.RoleClaimType%2A>属性使您能够指定应该用于评估在执行这些操作时，包含由标识的声明的声明类型。

trans-unit.source: Delegation scenarios are supported through the <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.Actor%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.BootstrapContext%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 通过支持委派方案<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.Actor%2A>和<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.BootstrapContext%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Adds a single claim to this claims identity.

trans-unit.source: The claim is examined and if the subject is different than this claims identity, the <xref:System.Security.Claims.Claim.Clone%28System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method is invoked with this claims identity as the parameter to create a new claim with the correct subject.
trans-unit.target: 检查声明和使用者是否不同于此声明标识，<xref:System.Security.Claims.Claim.Clone%28System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法调用与此声明作为参数使用正确的使用者创建新声明的标识。

trans-unit.source: This method has the `SecurityCritical` attribute applied to control which entities can add claims to the identity.
trans-unit.target: 此方法具有`SecurityCritical`应用于哪些实体可以添加为标识的声明的控件的属性。

trans-unit.source: Further down the pipe, authorization decisions are made based on the claims that are present in the <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.Claims%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 进一步关闭管道，授权决策都是基于在上中存在的声明<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.Claims%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="claim" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="claim" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任直接调用方。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分受信任或不透明的代码。

trans-unit.source: The claims to add.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的声明。

trans-unit.source: Adds a list of claims to this claims identity.
trans-unit.target: 添加声明列表到此声明标识。

trans-unit.source: Each claim is examined and if the subject is different than this claims identity, the <xref:System.Security.Claims.Claim.Clone%28System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method is invoked with this claims identity as the parameter to create a new claim with the correct subject.
trans-unit.target: 检查每个声明和使用者是否不同于此声明标识，<xref:System.Security.Claims.Claim.Clone%28System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法调用与此声明作为参数使用正确的使用者创建新声明的标识。

trans-unit.source: This method has the `SecurityCritical` attribute applied to control which entities can add claims to the identity.
trans-unit.target: 此方法具有`SecurityCritical`应用于哪些实体可以添加为标识的声明的控件的属性。

trans-unit.source: Further down the pipe, authorization decisions are made based on the claims that are present in the <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.Claims%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 进一步关闭管道，授权决策都是基于在上中存在的声明<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.Claims%2A>集合。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="claims" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任直接调用方。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分受信任或不透明的代码。

trans-unit.source: Gets the authentication type.
trans-unit.target: 获取身份验证类型。

trans-unit.source: The authentication type.
trans-unit.target: 身份验证类型。

trans-unit.source: Typically one of the values defined by the <xref:System.Security.Claims.AuthenticationTypes> class.
trans-unit.target: 通常定义的值之一<xref:System.Security.Claims.AuthenticationTypes>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the token that was used to create this claims identity.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于创建此声明标识的令牌。

trans-unit.source: The bootstrap context.
trans-unit.target: 启动上下文。

trans-unit.source: The underlying object is an instance of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BootstrapContext?displayProperty=nameWithType> class.
trans-unit.target: 基础对象是实例<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BootstrapContext?displayProperty=nameWithType>类。

trans-unit.source: Set the `saveBootstrapContext` attribute on either the [<identityConfiguration>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/identityconfiguration.md) or the [<securityTokenHandlerConfiguration>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/securitytokenhandlerconfiguration.md) element in a configuration file to specify whether the token used to generate the <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity> should be preserved in the <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.BootstrapContext%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 设置`saveBootstrapContext`属性上的[ <identityConfiguration> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/identityconfiguration.md)或[ <securityTokenHandlerConfiguration> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/securitytokenhandlerconfiguration.md)要指定的令牌是否用于生成的配置文件中的元素<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity>应保留在<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.BootstrapContext%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.BootstrapContext%2A> property is not `null`, applications can access the original token and the claims it produced through the properties and methods of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BootstrapContext?displayProperty=nameWithType> class.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.BootstrapContext%2A>属性不是`null`，应用程序可以通过属性和方法访问原始令牌和声明它会生成<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BootstrapContext?displayProperty=nameWithType>类。

trans-unit.source: Set operation requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 设置操作需要完全信任直接调用方。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be set by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能通过部分受信任的或透明的代码中设置。

trans-unit.source: Gets the claims associated with this claims identity.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此声明标识关联的声明。

trans-unit.source: The collection of claims associated with this claims identity.
trans-unit.target: 与此声明标识相关联的声明的集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection may contain entries that are `null`.
trans-unit.target: 集合可能包含的条目，将`null`。

trans-unit.source: The claims contained in the <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.Claims%2A> collection essentially describe the entity that is represented by the <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity>.
trans-unit.target: 中包含的声明<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.Claims%2A>集合实质上描述的实体，由表示<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity>。

trans-unit.source: The claims describe the properties and rights possessed by the entity and can be examined by applications to make decisions about authentication and authorization.
trans-unit.target: 介绍属性和由实体所拥有的权限并可以通过应用程序能够判断身份验证和授权检查这些声明。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal> class has a <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal.Claims%2A> property as well.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal>类具有<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal.Claims%2A>以及属性。

trans-unit.source: In the majority of cases you should access the user’s claims through the <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal.Claims%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> collection rather than through the <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.Claims%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下，你应访问通过用户的声明<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal.Claims%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>集合而不是通过<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.Claims%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: You will need to access the claims of an individual <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity> only in the cases where the principal contains more than one <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity> and you need to evaluate or modify a specific identity.
trans-unit.target: 你将需要访问个人的声明<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity>仅在其中主体包含多个情况下<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity>并且需要进行评估或修改特定标识。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new <see cref="T:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity" /> copied from this claims identity.
trans-unit.target: 返回从此声明标识中复制的新 <see cref="T:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity" />。

trans-unit.source: A copy of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 当前实例的副本。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.BinaryReader" /> that points to the claim.
trans-unit.target: 指向声明的 <see cref="T:System.IO.BinaryReader" />。

trans-unit.target: 为派生类型提供扩展点以创建自定义 <see cref="T:System.Security.Claims.Claim" />。

trans-unit.target: 一个新的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Claims.Claim" />。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="reader" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Contains any additional data provided by a derived type.
trans-unit.target: 包含派生类型提供的任何其他数据。

trans-unit.source: Typically set when calling <see cref="M:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.WriteTo(System.IO.BinaryWriter,System.Byte[])" />.
trans-unit.target: 通常在调用 <see cref="M:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.WriteTo(System.IO.BinaryWriter,System.Byte[])" /> 时设置。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> array representing the additional serialized data.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Byte" />数组，表示附加序列化数据。

trans-unit.source: The default issuer; "LOCAL AUTHORITY".
trans-unit.target: 默认颁发者，“地方当局”。

trans-unit.source: The default name claim type; <see cref="F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.Name" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认名称声明类型；<see cref="F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.Name" />。

trans-unit.source: The default role claim type; <see cref="F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.Role" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认角色声明类型；<see cref="F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.Role" />。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves all of the claims that match a specified condition.
trans-unit.target: 检索与指定条件匹配的所有声明。

trans-unit.source: The function that performs the matching logic.
trans-unit.target: 执行匹配逻辑的函数。

trans-unit.target: 检索指定的谓词匹配的所有声明。

trans-unit.source: The matching claims.
trans-unit.target: 匹配的声明。

trans-unit.target: 检索所有有指定声明类型的声明。

trans-unit.source: The matching claims.
trans-unit.target: 匹配的声明。

trans-unit.source: The list is read-only.

trans-unit.target: 使用序号大小写区分上进行比较`type`。

trans-unit.source: The function that performs the matching logic.
trans-unit.target: 执行匹配逻辑的函数。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the first claim that is matched by the specified predicate.
trans-unit.target: 检索由指定谓词匹配的第一个声明。

trans-unit.source: The first matching claim or <see langword="null" /> if no match is found.
trans-unit.target: 如果未找到匹配，则为第一个匹配声明或 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The first matching claim or <see langword="null" /> if no match is found.
trans-unit.target: 如果未找到匹配，则为第一个匹配声明或 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 要填充数据的对象。

trans-unit.target: 此序列化的目标。

trans-unit.source: Can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 可以为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Populates the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> with data needed to serialize the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 用序列化当前<see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 对象所需的数据来填充 <see cref="T:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity" />。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="info" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任直接调用方。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分受信任或不透明的代码。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the claims identity possesses a claim that matches specified conditions.
trans-unit.target: 确定该声明标识是否拥有与指定条件相匹配的声明。

trans-unit.source: The function that performs the matching logic.
trans-unit.target: 执行匹配逻辑的函数。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this claims identity has a claim that is matched by the specified predicate.
trans-unit.target: 确定该声明标识是否拥有与指定条件相匹配的声明。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a matching claim exists; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在匹配的声明，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="match" /> is **null**.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="match" /> 为 null。

trans-unit.source: The type of the claim to match.
trans-unit.target: 要匹配的声明类型。

trans-unit.source: The value of the claim to match.
trans-unit.target: 要匹配的声明的值。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this claims identity has a claim with the specified claim type and value.
trans-unit.target: 确定该声明标识是否具备指定声明类型和值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a match is found; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到匹配项，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Does not check the <xref:System.Security.Claims.Claim.Issuer%2A> or <xref:System.Security.Claims.Claim.OriginalIssuer%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 不会检查<xref:System.Security.Claims.Claim.Issuer%2A>或<xref:System.Security.Claims.Claim.OriginalIssuer%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The comparison is made using Ordinal, case sensitive on value; case in-sensitive on type.
trans-unit.target: 使用序号，区分大小写值; 在进行比较大小写区分类型。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="type" /> is **null**.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="type" /> 为 null。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is **null**.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 为 null。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the identity has been authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否验证了标识。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the identity has been authenticated; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果标识已经过身份验证;否则为**false**。

trans-unit.source: `true` if the <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.AuthenticationType%2A> property is not `null` or an empty string.
trans-unit.target: `true` 如果<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.AuthenticationType%2A>属性不是`null`或空字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the label for this claims identity.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此声明标识的标签。

trans-unit.source: The label.
trans-unit.target: 标签。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of this claims identity.
trans-unit.target: 获取此声明标识的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name or <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 姓名或 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of the first claim with a type that matches the name claim type set in the <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.NameClaimType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 返回的值类型的名称相匹配的第一个声明的声明类型在中设置<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.NameClaimType%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If no claim is found that matches the name claim type, returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有声明找到匹配的名称声明类型，将返回`null`。

trans-unit.source: Gets the claim type that is used to determine which claims provide the value for the <see cref="P:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.Name" /> property of this claims identity.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于确定为此声明标识的 <see cref="P:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.Name" /> 属性提供值的声明的声明类型。

trans-unit.source: The name claim type.
trans-unit.target: 名称声明类型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.NameClaimType%2A> property specifies the claim type (<xref:System.Security.Claims.Claim.Type%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>) that is used to provide the name for this identity.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.NameClaimType%2A>属性指定的声明类型 (<xref:System.Security.Claims.Claim.Type%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>) 用于提供此标识的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name is accessed through the <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.Name%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 通过访问名称<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.Name%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This property is set by the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 构造函数设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: The claim to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的声明。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to remove a claim from the claims identity.
trans-unit.target: 尝试从声明标识中移除一个声明。

trans-unit.source: It is possible that the claim cannot be removed because it is not owned by the identity.
trans-unit.target: 很可能无法删除该声明，因为它不由标识拥有。

trans-unit.source: For example, this would be the case for role claims that are owned by the principal.
trans-unit.target: 例如，这会出现此情况的主体拥有的角色声明。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.TryRemoveClaim%2A> method, which returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the claim has been removed, <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.RemoveClaim%2A> throws an exception if the claim could not be removed
trans-unit.target: 与不同<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.TryRemoveClaim%2A>方法，它返回一个布尔值，该值指示是否已移除的声明，<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.RemoveClaim%2A>时无法删除该声明引发异常

trans-unit.source: The specified claim is matched by object reference (<xref:System.Object.ReferenceEquals%2A>).
trans-unit.target: 指定的声明匹配的对象引用 (<xref:System.Object.ReferenceEquals%2A>)。

trans-unit.source: This method has the `SecurityCritical` attribute applied to control which entities can remove claims from the identity.
trans-unit.target: 此方法具有`SecurityCritical`应用于哪些实体，声明可移除标识控件的属性。

trans-unit.source: Further down the pipe, authorization decisions are made based on the claims that are present in the <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.Claims%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 进一步关闭管道，授权决策都是基于在上中存在的声明<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.Claims%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: The claim cannot be removed.
trans-unit.target: 无法移除声明。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任直接调用方。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分受信任或不透明的代码。

trans-unit.source: Gets the claim type that will be interpreted as a .NET Framework role among the claims in this claims identity.
trans-unit.target: 获取将解释为此声明标识中声明的 .NET Framework 角色的声明类型。

trans-unit.source: The role claim type.
trans-unit.target: 角色声明类型。

trans-unit.source: The role claim type is the claim type (<xref:System.Security.Claims.Claim.Type%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>) that is used when evaluating this identity for the <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal.IsInRole%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 角色声明类型是声明类型 (<xref:System.Security.Claims.Claim.Type%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>) 计算此标识时，使用<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal.IsInRole%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal.IsInRole%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method is called to determine whether the current principal is in a specified role.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal.IsInRole%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>调用方法来确定当前的主体是否属于指定角色。

trans-unit.source: The claims-based model extends this check to use claims presented by the principal.
trans-unit.target: 基于声明的模型将扩展此检查用于提供主体的声明。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal> object can contain one or more <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity> objects and each identity object can contain multiple <xref:System.Security.Claims.Claim> objects.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal>对象可以包含一个或多个<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity>对象和每个标识对象可以包含多个<xref:System.Security.Claims.Claim>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.RoleClaimType%2A> property specifies the claim type of the claim that should be used to provide the value for the role when evaluating this <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.RoleClaimType%2A>属性指定应该用于计算此时为角色提供的值的声明的声明类型<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity>对象。

trans-unit.source: The property is set by the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 该属性设置构造函数中。

trans-unit.source: A common value is <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.Role?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 常用的值是<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.Role?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The claim to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的声明。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to remove a claim from the claims identity.
trans-unit.target: 尝试从声明标识中移除一个声明。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the claim was successfully removed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已成功移除了声明，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: It is possible that the claim cannot be removed because it is not owned by the identity.
trans-unit.target: 很可能无法删除该声明，因为它不由标识拥有。

trans-unit.source: For example, this would be the case for role claims that are owned by the principal.
trans-unit.target: 例如，这会出现此情况的主体拥有的角色声明。

trans-unit.source: The specified claim is matched by object reference (<xref:System.Object.ReferenceEquals%2A>).
trans-unit.target: 指定的声明匹配的对象引用 (<xref:System.Object.ReferenceEquals%2A>)。

trans-unit.source: This method has the `SecurityCritical` attribute applied to control which entities can remove claims from the identity.
trans-unit.target: 此方法具有`SecurityCritical`应用于哪些实体，声明可移除标识控件的属性。

trans-unit.source: Further down the pipe, authorization decisions are made based on the claims that are present in the <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.Claims%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 进一步关闭管道，授权决策都是基于在上中存在的声明<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.Claims%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任直接调用方。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分受信任或不透明的代码。

trans-unit.source: The writer to use for data storage.
trans-unit.target: 数据存储使用的编写器。

trans-unit.source: Serializes using a <see cref="T:System.IO.BinaryWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.IO.BinaryWriter" /> 序列化。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="writer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="writer" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The writer to use for data storage.
trans-unit.target: 数据存储使用的编写器。

trans-unit.source: Additional data provided by the derived type.
trans-unit.target: 派生类型提供的其他数据。

trans-unit.source: Serializes using a <see cref="T:System.IO.BinaryWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.IO.BinaryWriter" /> 序列化。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="writer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="writer" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。
